title: And this is why plastic straws are slowly being banned : r/memes - Reddit
body: The VAST majority of plastic wast in the ocean is from commercial fishing nets, industrial waste, and stuff that gets washed out to sea durring floods, tsunamis, etc. It's estimated straws make up less than 1% of plastic waste. Lets try and adress the big causes first. 38. LuckyWaffles121 • 4 yr. ago.
